item.title: Putting owners in Security Bug Jail
item.description: Some organization have this interesting concept of a bug jail to prevent new feature development when there are too many existing flaws in the system. For instance, if an engineer has more then 10 bugs assigned they aren’t allowed to work on anything else but fixing their bugs. What is the Security Bug Jail? A security bug jail goes along the same lines, the owner of a system can never have more then a certain upper limit of security bugs.
